Posts.Content: Leslie, just now saw your message. You mention you are on a flax and cottage cheese regiment--what type of cancer did you have? The reason I am questioning this is that breast and ovarian cancers are estrogen sensitive. Which means you wouldn't want to eat flax seed or flax seed oil, soy, fennel, etc.--anything that is estrogen-like. Was your treatment at CTCA covered by your insurance?
Posts.Title: Living With Breast Cancer
